notification.text: What is your name.and what you do?

reply: Hey there! I'm so glad you asked! My name is [Your Name], and I'm a [Your Profession/Title]. I help [Your Target Audience] with [What You Help Them With] through [Your Services/Products]. I love connecting with my [Number] followers here on Instagram and sharing tips, inspiration, and behind-the-scenes glimpses into my work. Let me know if you have any other questions!
